I am a postdoctoral researcher in educational research at the [University of T端bingen](https://uni-tuebingen.de/) in Germany.

## Interests

My research interests encompass:

- causal inference
- automation of data analyses with {{< fa brands r-project size=xl >}} and `Quarto`
- latent variable modeling (focus on longitudinal analyses)
- motivation & personality development
